title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-2.7 - Annual assessment of the immunization level of students attending the institution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 66-2.7 - Annual assessment of the immunization level of students attending the institution

State Regulations

The institution shall provide annually to the commissioner, on a form provided by the commissioner, a summary report of the immunization status of students attending the institution to whom this regulation applies. This report must be submitted by December 15th of each year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
66-2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
